document_data.caption: The river Lis and surrounding area.
document_data.name: River Lis
document_data.mainbody:
The '''River Lis''' was a shallow swampy river connecting the [[Moonsea (lake)|Moonsea]] to the [[Dragon Reach]] and the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]]. It was known to [[elves]] as '''Nuathlis''' and to [[orc]]s as the '''Blood River'''.

{{quote|''River Lis is no easy trip. The [[orc]]s call her "the Blood River." which says it all.''|A sailor from [[Elmwood]].}}
